game.name: Crazy Tennis
game.description:
A horde of dangerous aliens has captured Earth and started killing people everywhere. They are a biggest fan of tennis games, so you have made a deal with them. These deadly creatures have got ready to leave your planet only on the condition if you beat them in a tennis tournament. Are you ready to take up this biggest challenge of your life? Join Crazy Tennis game and beat these unwelcome visitors and prove the world that you are a true caretaker of human beings! Hurry up friends! These fun cartoon animals are awaiting you. 
In this online sports game, you will have to flex your muscles, grab your racket and get you prepared to put on your sweatband. The seamless gameplay combined with amazing graphics and easy control offers you experience that you have not taken before. Luckily, aliens have got agreed to play tennis online on the terms you have shared with them. Do your best to win each match against these bad souls! You have to swing your racket and run around regularly. 
Use the space key to swing your racket and arrow keys to move your character around in the court in this html5 tennis game! There are two different characters and three aliens as your opponent to choose from. Improve your skills and understand the gameplay by joining the tutorial before entering the actual game! It includes 3 unique difficulty settings and, the most important thing is that the stats of the characters will vary based on each of these settings. All the best to win a series of tennis matches for the sake of Earth!

game.mobileControlKeys: LEFT ICON TO MOVE, RIGHT ICON TO HIT THE SHOT
game.webControlKeys: SPACE-HIT THE BALL,ALL ARROWS TO MOVE ARROUND
